content.question: Which of the following best describes the relationship between the third paragraph and the first two paragraphs?

choices.label: The third paragraph presents evidence contradicting a claim introduced and described in the first two paragraphs.
The third paragraph provides technical specifications that refine a definition introduced and explained in the first two paragraphs.
The third paragraph draws a conclusion from evidence introduced and described in the first two paragraphs.
The third paragraph broadens a concept introduced and described in the first two paragraphs.

content.answer: The third paragraph broadens a concept introduced and described in the first two paragraphs.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
